item.title: Nationalise the Energy Sector (in Dutch)
item.description: This is an opinion piece written for the Dutch newspaper Trouw. It argues that the root cause of the current exhorbitant energy prices in The Netherlands lies in the privatisation of the country’s energy sector in the early 2000s. Only taking the energy sector back into public ownership will address this. Terwijl huishoudens met de hashtag #ikredhetniet alarm slaan over onmenselijk hoge energierekeningen, hebben energiebedrijven zelden zoâ€™n goede periode achter de rug gehad.
